SmokyScotch 0.6.0
  • Reference

Creating CV data partition

cvPartition.Rd

Creating CV data partition

cvPartition(x, y, nFolds)

Arguments

x

x should be a matrix without rownames
y

y should be true labels
nFolds

number of folds

Examples

x = iris[51:150, -5]
y = factor(iris[51:150, 5])
cvp = cvPartition(x = x, y = y, nFolds = 5)
str(cvp)
